_source.text: 1. Gurren Lagann is just so much better than any airplane (to some people) that it'll take it's match only to... 2. Go up the VF-1 because I'm always wrong and there are some airplanes that are better than others (even though I'll be voting for Turn A). 3. Gunbuster will beat the Zaku II because...I don't know why.
